metadata.name: #1 - HAPPY NEW YEAR
metadata.description:
January 1 - from 00:00:00 to 00:00:10

Human #0 to #2,537

This NFT is part of a collection of 13 unique videos taken at different times from the www.fallof.men project which visualizes 8 billion people falling over a period of one year.

1920x1080 - 10 seconds - 24FPS - audio
